conjunction.name: Conjunction
conjunction.interpretation: Powerful combination of planetary forces, can be harmonious or challenging depending on planets involved
conjunction.inNatalChart: Represents core personality themes and intense focus areas
conjunction.inTransits: New beginnings and intensified energy in life areas
conjunction.inSynastry: Strong attraction and connection between people

sextile.name: Sextile
sextile.basicMeaning: Harmonious energy that requires effort to activate
sextile.interpretation: Opportunities for growth and positive expression with conscious effort
sextile.inNatalChart: Natural talents that can be developed with effort
sextile.inTransits: Opportunities for positive change and growth

square.name: Square
square.basicMeaning: Dynamic tension that motivates action and growth
square.interpretation: Challenges that lead to strength and character development
square.inNatalChart: Internal tensions that drive personal growth
square.inTransits: Challenges and obstacles that promote development
square.inSynastry: Tension that can be stimulating or problematic

trine.name: Trine
trine.interpretation: Natural talents and easy energy flow between planets
trine.inNatalChart: Natural gifts and areas of ease in life
trine.inTransits: Periods of harmony and positive flow
trine.inSynastry: Natural harmony and understanding between people

opposition.name: Opposition
opposition.basicMeaning: Polarity that seeks balance and integration
opposition.interpretation: Opposite energies that need to be balanced and integrated
opposition.inNatalChart: Areas where balance and integration are needed
opposition.inTransits: Culmination points and awareness of opposing forces
opposition.inSynastry: Attraction of opposites, can be balancing or polarizing
